testApache

Class ApacheNLPSentenceTokenizerClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • testApache.ApacheNLPSentenceTokenizerClass

  • public class ApacheNLPSentenceTokenizerClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a simple sentence tokenizer. You can pass in the location of the tokenizer bin (of Apache NLP), that will help parse the text.
    Author:
    Sriram
